sentences.sContent: Joanna spent most of her twenties virtually estranged from her father.
sentences.sCn: 乔安娜在20多岁的大部分时间和她爸爸几乎不来往。

synos.tran: 使疏远；使隔离；使离间（estrange的过去分词）

remMethod.val: e + strange(陌生的) + d → 使…陌生的 → 疏远的

trans.tranOther: no longer seeing or talking to a relative or good friend, because of an argument
